mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Pallock, George
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Sullivan Co., NY [Sullivan County, New York]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Pallock, George Patient Age: 21. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of right leg. Bullet entered at posterior and lateral aspect of leg near the internal border of gastrocnemii muscles inward and downwards fracturing the tibia middle third. Bullet lodged . Location Wounded: Cumberland, MD . Date Wounded: 1864/11/16. Nature of Wound: Revolver bullet, accidentally by guard. Result: Discharged from service.
